name: You Just Died
description:
You Just Died. In this game you play as Davey. He wakes up in his childhood home, it's different, yet familliar. Where will he end up while wandering through this dreamy interpretation of the afterlife? And will you find out the dark truth about his past?

System Requirements As this is my first game I don't know a lot about optimization yet, so the game may have long loading times if your PC doesn't meet these requirements
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • RAM: 8GB or more
  • GPU: GTX 1060 or newer

It would be very helpfull if you could post in the comments what your specs are and how the game ran on your machine ;3

Installation
  1. Download the game
  2. Unzip the file
  3. Open "You Just Died.exe"
  4. Have fun!
